content.body: I am imagining the thing mark wants is `IsPromise(p) && GetOwnProperty(p, 'then') == undefined && GetPrototypeOf(p) == Promise.prototype`, basically, which seems like an interesting alternative to the current `constructor` fast-path in `await`

content.body: no Mathieu Hofman there's disagreement. i agreed that frozen environments are *a* breakage to consider. i can generalize that disagreement more: the frozen environment breakage is a "second order" breakage to me in that it breaks the users of a library that mutates the environment to be different than the specced standard of 262. i don't want to weigh that very strongly
